title: This week’s top stories: Pixel 6 to improve USB audio, YouTube Vanced Manager marked harmful, more
content:
In this week’s top stories: Google Pixel 6 set to gain better USB audio support, YouTube Vanced Manager gets marked “harmful,” Nest Hub gains redesign in buggy update, and more.

more…
